titles.title: A bill to amend section 127 of title 23, United States Code (relating to vehicle weight), to permit the operation of vehicles in the State of Nebraska which could be lawfully operated within such State on May 1, 1982.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.
Referred to Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

bill.summary: 1/21/1987--Introduced. Amends Federal law relating to vehicle weight limitations on the Interstate System to provide that laws or regulations in effect on May 1, 1982, in the State of Nebraska regarding such limitations shall apply for purposes of Federal-aid highway funding (thus permitting the operation of vehicles which could lawfully be operated within such State on May 1, 1982).
